job_description: Implement data integration and exchange using formats like FHIR, HL7, and CSV, incorporating data into databases such as MS SQL Server, Oracle, and Azure.
We are looking for a mid-level to senior data engineer who wants to work on new data cloud tools in an exciting environment.
Knowledge of advanced data engineering concepts such as dimensional modeling, ETL, data governance, data warehousing involving structured and unstructured data.

job_title: Senior Data Engineer, Compliance Technology (Hybrid in LA, PHX or Charlotte)
job_description: At least 2 years of experience building and operating data pipelines, data lakes, and/or data warehouses in Azure cloud.
5+ years of industry experience as a data engineer working on healthcare data solutions is required, with at least 3 years directly managing projects or teams.
